auth.basic.generated_token1:
1. Visit the MyApp page (you might have to login first):

https://www.dropbox.com/developers/apps

2. Proceed with "Create App"
3. Choose "{{.API}}"
4. Choose "{{.TypeOfAccess}}"
5. Enter name of your app
6. Proceed with "Create App"
7. Hit "Generate" button near "Generated access token"
8. Copy generated token
auth.basic.oauth_seq1:
1. Visit the URL for the auth dialog:

{{.Url}}

2. Click 'Allow' (you might have to login first):
3. Copy the authorisation code:
auth.basic.verify.failed: Unable to verify token, or invalid token. Please retry
flow.error.unable_to_read: Unable to read file at path `{{.Path}}` with error {{.Error}}

This document contains licensing information relating to the use of
free and open-source software.

recipe.member.detach.desc: Convert Dropbox Business accounts to Basic account
recipe.member.invite.tag.user_already_on: User is already on this team
recipe.member.invite.tag.user_on_another: User is already on another team
recipe.team.sharedlink.cap.expiry.desc: Force expiration date of public shared links within the team
run.app.license: Licensed under open source licenses. Use the `license` command for more detail.
run.common.flag.quiet: Suppress non error messages, and make output readable by machine (JSON format)
run.common.flag.secure: Do not store tokens into a file
run.error.interrupted.instruction: Logs and reports are stored at: {{.JobPath}}
run.error.panic.instruction: Logs and reports are stored at: {{.JobPath}}
run.network.error.unreachable:
Network unreachable to `{{.Url}}`.
Please ensure your network connection or proxy configuration.
Please specify `-proxy` option if your machine is under proxy or firewall.

Error:
{{.Error}}
web.conn.business_audit.detail: Team information, plus the team's detailed activity log
web.conn.business_file.detail: Team information and auditing, plus the ability to perform any action as any team member
web.conn.business_info.detail: Information about the team and aggregate usage data
web.conn.business_management.detail: Team information, plus the ability to add, edit, and delete team members
web.conn.user_full.detail: Access to all files and folders in individual user's Dropbox
web.error.forbidden.detail: Invalid credential. Please login through the given url.
web.error.server.detail: Please see logs for more detail.
